utils module

This module is used to scale and rescale the observations and actions of the RL agent —

utils.clip_actions(X)[source]

Function takes the array of actions \([F, \dot Q]\) and convert to the given range.

Parameters:

X_scaled (list, np.ndarray) – Array of four values`.

Returns:

returns the original values of the array X_scaled.

Return type:

X (list, np.ndarray)

utils.normalize_minmax_actions(X: ndarray)[source]

This function four states \([F, \dot Q]\) as the input and reverse-transform each of them from range [-1 to 1] to their actual range.

Parameters:

X_scaled (list, np.ndarray) – Array of two values \([F, \dot Q]\).

Returns:

returns the original values of the array X_scaled.

Return type:

X (list, np.ndarray)

utils.normalize_minmax_error(X: ndarray)[source]

This function takes error of four states \([C_A, C_B, T_R, T_K]\) as the input and transform each of them to the range [-1 to 1] using minmax-scaling.

Parameters:

X (list, np.ndarray) – Array of four values.

Returns:

Scaled values of the array X.

Return type:

X_scaled (list, np.ndarray)

utils.normalize_minmax_ierror(X: ndarray)[source]

This function takes integral error of four states \([C_A, C_B, T_R, T_K]\) as the input and transform each of them to the range [-1 to 1] using minmax-scaling.

Parameters:

X (list, np.ndarray) – Array of four values.

Returns:

Scaled values of the array X.

Return type:

X_scaled (list, np.ndarray)

utils.normalize_minmax_states(X: ndarray)[source]

This function takes four states \([C_A, C_B, T_R, T_K]\) as the input and transform each of them to the range [-1 to 1] using minmax-scaling.

Parameters:

X (list, np.ndarray) – Array of four values \([C_A, C_B, T_R, T_K]\).

Returns:

Scaled values of the array X.

Return type:

X_scaled (list, np.ndarray)

utils.reverse_normalize_minmax_actions(X_scaled: ndarray)[source]

function takes two actions \([F, \dot Q]\) as the input and reverse-transform each of them from range [-1 to 1] to their actual range.

Parameters:

X_scaled (list, np.ndarray) – Array of two values \([F, \dot Q]\).

Returns:

returns the original values of the array X_scaled.

Return type:

X (list, np.ndarray)

Parameters:

X_scaled (list, np.ndarray) – Array of four values`.

utils.reverse_normalize_minmax_states(X_scaled: ndarray)[source]
